005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
009
010import java.util.Collection;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013
014public interface IConstraintSet {
015  /**
016   * Get the constraints in the constraint set that apply to the provided module.
017   *
018   * @param module
019   *          a Metaschema module
020   * @return an iterator over the constraints that target the module
021   */
022  @NonNull
023  Iterable<ITargetedConstraints> getTargetedConstraintsForModule(@NonNull IModule module);
024
025  /**
026   * Get constraint sets imported by this constraint set.
027   *
028   * @return the imported constraint sets
029   */
030  @NonNull
031  Collection<IConstraintSet> getImportedConstraintSets();
032}
